items.title: Fashion retailer Hugo Boss shares pop 5% on better-than-feared first-quarter sales
items.description: Shares of Hugo Boss climbed after posting a lower-than-feared decline in first-quarter sales and reiterated its full-year guidance.

items.title: Ford suspends 2025 guidance amid $2.5 billion tariff impact
items.description: Ford Motor beat Wall Street's first-quarter expectations, but suspended its 2025 financial guidance amid an expected $2.5 billion impact this year fro...

items.title: Palantir shares fall as company reports in-line earnings, lifts full-year guidance
items.description: Palantir boosted its guidance for the year on Monday, as net income in the latest quarter more than doubled.

items.title: Hims & Hers gives weak outlook but says more collaborations are coming
items.description: Hims & Hers shares fell in extended trading on Monday after the company reported first-quarter earnings that offered soft guidance.

items.title: 2 big things to watch this week as the S&P 500 looks to extend its historic win streak
items.description: Could the rallying S&P 500 go for 10 in a row?
